text: obsession becomes not just a part of the journey, but the journey itself.
You've got to be so deeply engrossed in your crap that the world thinks you're a little
crazy.
Why?
Because true mastery demands it.
While others are caught up in the trivial, the gains, the day-to-day distractions, your
laser focused, counting your steps towards greatness, living in sequences and numbers.
This isn't for everyone.
It's for those who dare to distance themselves
from the comfort of normal and dive deep
into the abyss of excellence.
You see, when you commit to your dream,
really commit everything else fades into the background.
conversations, events, even time.
It all just blurs.
All that remains is you and your passion,
your craft, your destiny.
This level of dedication is misunderstood by many,
but it's not about them, it's about you.
It's about becoming so intertwined with your purpose that nothing else matters.
That's the hallmark of the truly dedicated, the sign of the truly great
